mn105:17.2: anabhāvaṃkate → anabhāvakate (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); anabhāvaṅgate (sya1ed, sya2ed, km)
mn105:18.4: atathaṃ samānaṃ → atathaṃ sa mānaṃ (bj); atthaṃ samānaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | Evaṃmāni → evaṃ mānī (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); evamādi (sya-all, km)
mn105:19.6: Saupādisesoti → anupādisesoti (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | jānamāno → maññamāno (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
